description: Detects PowerShell download and execution cradles.
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: Some PowerShell installers were seen using similar combinations. Apply filters accordingly
name: PowerShell Download and Execution Cradles
query: (process.command_line.text:("*.DownloadString\(*" OR "*.DownloadFile\(*" OR "*Invoke\-WebRequest\ *" OR "*iwr\ *") AND process.command_line.text:("*;iex\ $*" OR "*|\ IEX*" OR "*|IEX\ *" OR "*I`E`X*" OR "*I`EX*" OR "*IE`X*" OR "*iex\ *" OR "*IEX\ \(*" OR "*IEX\(*" OR "*Invoke\-Expression*"))
